name: NEONBeat Jam Edition
description:
Shoot your way through a level of neon mayhem in this Incredibly Polished bullet hell shmup.

Note, there is a known issue that prevents the music playing if you mash fire too fast to restart. I can't upload a fix until after BulletHellJam2022 voting has concluded

An effective workaround is to not mash fire too fast to restart.

Oh, and apparently the input mapping isn't clear for PS pads. The buttons on the instructions refer to the Xbox pad, so X isn't where you think it is. It's meant to be the bottom button to fire, left button for laser. Your button labels may vary, and the wrong button may inadvertently quit the game instead of starting. A little puzzle for you there, no charge.

10 evenings work, submitted to BulletHellJam2022
